location.Description: The location of the device. This is a supported and registered Azure geographical region (for example, West US, East US, or Southeast Asia). The geographical region of a device cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geographical region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

tags.Description: The list of tags that describe the device. These tags can be used to view and group this device (across resource groups).

properties.Description: The properties of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

tier.Description: The SKU tier. This is based on the SKU name.

principalId.Description: Service Principal Id backing the Msi

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

dataBoxEdgeDeviceStatus.Description: The status of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

serialNumber.Description: The Serial Number of Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

description.Description: The Description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

modelDescription.Description: The description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

deviceType.Description: The type of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

friendlyName.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device name.

culture.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device culture.

deviceModel.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

deviceSoftwareVersion.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device software version.

deviceLocalCapacity.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device local capacity in MB.

timeZone.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device timezone.

deviceHcsVersion.Description: The device software version number of the device (eg: 1.2.18105.6).

nodeCount.Description: The number of nodes in the cluster.

resourceMoveDetails.Description: The details of the move operation on this resource.

edgeProfile.Description: The details of Edge Profile for this resource

dataResidency.Description: The details of data-residency related properties for this resource

computeVersionInformation.Description: The details of compute version information

operationInProgress.Description: Denotes whether move operation is in progress

operationInProgressLockTimeoutInUTC.Description: Denotes the timeout of the operation to finish

properties.Description: The properties of the bandwidth schedule.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of BandwidthSchedule

start.Description: The start time of the schedule in UTC.

stop.Description: The stop time of the schedule in UTC.

days.Description: The days of the week when this schedule is applicable.

properties.Description: Properties of the diagnostic proactive log collection settings.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of DiagnosticProactiveLogCollectionSettings

properties.Description: Properties of the remote support  settings.

systemData.Description: Represents resource creation and updation time

remoteSupportSettingsList.Description: Remote support settings list according to the RemoteApplicationType

accessLevel.Description: Access level allowed for this remote application type

kind.Description: It specify the order api version.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Order

orderId.Description: It specify the order resource id.

orderHistory.Description: List of status changes in the order.

deliveryTrackingInfo.Description: Tracking information for the package delivered to the customer whether it has an original or a replacement device.

returnTrackingInfo.Description: Tracking information for the package returned from the customer whether it has an original or a replacement device.

status.Description: Status of the order as per the allowed status types.

comments.Description: Comments related to this status change.

trackingInformation.Description: Tracking information related to the state in the ordering flow

additionalOrderDetails.Description:
Dictionary to hold generic information which is not stored
by the already existing properties

serialNumber.Description: Serial number of the device being tracked.

carrierName.Description: Name of the carrier used in the delivery.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Role

hostPlatform.Description: Host OS supported by the IoT role.

ioTDeviceDetails.Description: IoT device metadata to which data box edge device needs to be connected.

ioTEdgeDeviceDetails.Description: IoT edge device to which the IoT role needs to be configured.

shareMappings.Description: Mount points of shares in role(s).

ioTEdgeAgentInfo.Description: Iot edge agent details to download the agent and bootstrap iot runtime.

hostPlatformType.Description: Platform where the Iot runtime is hosted.

deviceId.Description: ID of the IoT device/edge device.

ioTHostHub.Description: Host name for the IoT hub associated to the device.

ioTHostHubId.Description: Id for the IoT hub associated to the device.

authentication.Description: Encrypted IoT device/IoT edge device connection string.

connectionString.Description: Connection string based on the symmetric key.

encryptionCertThumbprint.Description: Thumbprint certificate used to encrypt \"Value\". If the value is unencrypted, it will be null.

shareId.Description: ID of the share mounted to the role VM.

roleId.Description: ID of the role to which share is mounted.

imageName.Description: Name of the IoT edge agent image.

hostPlatform.Description: Host OS supported by the Kubernetes role.

hostPlatformType.Description: Platform where the runtime is hosted.

ipConfiguration.Description: IP Configuration of the Kubernetes node.

ipAddress.Description: IP address of the Kubernetes node.

endpoints.Description: Mount points of shares in role(s).

posixCompliant.Description: If provisioned storage is posix compliant.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Addon

hostPlatform.Description: Host OS supported by the Arc addon.

hostPlatformType.Description: Platform where the runtime is hosted.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of MonitoringConfiguration

resourceId.Description: The Resource ID on which the metrics should be pushed.

mdmAccount.Description: The MDM account to which the counters should be pushed.

metricNameSpace.Description: The MDM namespace to which the counters should be pushed. This is required if MDMAccount is specified

counterSets.Description: Host name for the IoT hub associated to the device.

counters.Description: The counters that should be collected in this set.

instance.Description: The instance from which counter should be collected.

additionalDimensions.Description: The additional dimensions to be added to metric.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Share

monitoringStatus.Description: Current monitoring status of the share.

azureContainerInfo.Description: Azure container mapping for the share.

accessProtocol.Description: Access protocol to be used by the share.

userAccessRights.Description: Mapping of users and corresponding access rights on the share (required for SMB protocol).

clientAccessRights.Description: List of IP addresses and corresponding access rights on the share(required for NFS protocol).

refreshDetails.Description: Details of the refresh job on this share.

shareMappings.Description: Share mount point to the role.

storageAccountCredentialId.Description: ID of the storage account credential used to access storage.

containerName.Description: Container name (Based on the data format specified, this represents the name of Azure Files/Page blob/Block blob).

dataFormat.Description: Storage format used for the file represented by the share.

userId.Description: User ID (already existing in the device).

accessType.Description: Type of access to be allowed for the user.

accessPermission.Description: Type of access to be allowed for the client.

inProgressRefreshJobId.Description: If a refresh job is currently in progress on this share or container, this field indicates the ARM resource ID of that job. The field is empty if no job is in progress.

lastCompletedRefreshJobTimeInUTC.Description: Indicates the completed time for the last refresh job on this particular share or container, if any.This could be a failed job or a successful job.

errorManifestFile.Description: Indicates the relative path of the error xml for the last refresh job on this particular share or container, if any. This could be a failed job or a successful job.

lastJob.Description: Indicates the id of the last refresh job on this particular share or container,if any. This could be a failed job or a successful job.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of StorageAccountCredential

connectionString.Description: Connection string for the storage account. Use this string if username and account key are not specified.

sslStatus.Description: Signifies whether SSL needs to be enabled or not.

blobDomainName.Description: Blob end point for private clouds.

accountType.Description: Type of storage accessed on the storage account.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of StorageAccount

storageAccountStatus.Description: Current status of the storage account

dataPolicy.Description: Data policy of the storage Account.

containerCount.Description: The Container Count. Present only for Storage Accounts with DataPolicy set to Cloud.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Container

refreshDetails.Description: Details of the refresh job on this container.

createdDateTime.Description: The UTC time when container got created.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Trigger

customContextTag.Description: A custom context tag typically used to correlate the trigger against its usage. For example, if a periodic timer trigger is intended for certain specific IoT modules in the device, the tag can be the name or the image URL of the module.

A custom context tag typically used to correlate the trigger against its usage. For example, if a periodic timer trigger is intended for certain specific IoT modules in the device, the tag can be the name or the image URL of the module.

startTime.Description: The time of the day that results in a valid trigger. Schedule is computed with reference to the time specified upto seconds. If timezone is not specified the time will considered to be in device timezone. The value will always be returned as UTC time.

schedule.Description: Periodic frequency at which timer event needs to be raised. Supports daily, hourly, minutes, and seconds.

topic.Description: Topic where periodic events are published to IoT device.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of User

shareAccessRights.Description: List of shares that the user has rights on. This field should not be specified during user creation.

accessType.Description: Type of access to be allowed on the share for this user.

properties.Description: The properties of network settings of a device.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of NetworkSettings

networkAdapters.Description: The network adapter list on the device.

nodeId.Description: Node ID of the network adapter.

status.Description: Value indicating whether this adapter is valid.

rdmaStatus.Description: Value indicating whether this adapter is RDMA capable.

dhcpStatus.Description: Value indicating whether this adapter has DHCP enabled.

ipv4Configuration.Description: The IPv4 configuration of the network adapter.

ipv6Configuration.Description: The IPv6 configuration of the network adapter.

dnsServers.Description: The list of DNS Servers of the device.

ipAddress.Description: The IPv4 address of the network adapter.

subnet.Description: The IPv4 subnet of the network adapter.

gateway.Description: The IPv4 gateway of the network adapter.

ipAddress.Description: The IPv6 address of the network adapter.

prefixLength.Description: The IPv6 prefix of the network adapter.

gateway.Description: The IPv6 gateway of the network adapter.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of UpdateSummary

deviceVersionNumber.Description: The current version of the device in format: 1.2.17312.13.",

friendlyDeviceVersionName.Description: The current version of the device in text format.

deviceLastScannedDateTime.Description: The last time when a scan was done on the device.

lastCompletedScanJobDateTime.Description: The time when the last scan job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

lastSuccessfulScanJobTime.Description: Time when the last scan job is successfully completed.

lastCompletedDownloadJobDateTime.Description: The time when the last Download job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

lastCompletedDownloadJobId.Description: JobId of the last ran download job.(Can be success/cancelled/failed)

lastDownloadJobStatus.Description: JobStatus of the last ran download job.

lastSuccessfulInstallJobDateTime.Description: The time when the Last Install job was completed successfully on the appliance

lastCompletedInstallJobDateTime.Description: The time when the last Install job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

lastCompletedInstallJobId.Description: JobId of the last ran install job.(Can be success/cancelled/failed)

lastInstallJobStatus.Description: JobStatus of the last ran install job.

totalNumberOfUpdatesAvailable.Description: The number of updates available for the current device version as per the last device scan.

totalNumberOfUpdatesPendingDownload.Description: The total number of items pending download.

totalNumberOfUpdatesPendingInstall.Description: The total number of items pending install.

rebootBehavior.Description: Indicates if updates are available and at least one of the updates needs a reboot.

inProgressDownloadJobId.Description: The job ID of the download job in progress.

inProgressInstallJobId.Description: The job ID of the install job in progress.

inProgressDownloadJobStartedDateTime.Description: The time when the currently running download (if any) started.

inProgressInstallJobStartedDateTime.Description: The time when the currently running install (if any) started.

updateTitles.Description: The list of updates available for install.

updates.Description: The list of updates available for install.

totalUpdateSizeInBytes.Description: The total size of updates available for download in bytes.

estimatedInstallTimeInMins.Description: Estimated Install Time for the update

rebootBehavior.Description: Indicates if updates are available and at least one of the updates needs a reboot.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of Alert

appearedAtDateTime.Description: UTC time when the alert appeared.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to device capacity info.

clusterStorageCapacityInfo.Description: Cluster capacity data for storage resources (CSV).

clusterComputeCapacityInfo.Description: Cluster capacity data for compute resources (Memory and GPU).

nodeCapacityInfos.Description: The dictionary of individual node names and node capacities in the cluster.

clusterTotalStorageMb.Description: Total storage on the cluster in MB.

clusterFreeStorageMb.Description: The available or free storage on the cluster in MB.

lastRefreshedTime.Description: The last time at which the ClusterCapacityViewData was set.

totalProvisionedNonHpnCores.Description: The total # of vCPUs provisioned by non-HPN VM per appliance.

gpuUsedUnitsCount.Description: The used GPU units count in the cluster.

gpuFreeUnitsCount.Description: The free GPU units count in the cluster.

gpuReservedForFailoverUnitsCount.Description: The GPU units count reserved for failover in the cluster.

gpuTotalUnitsCount.Description: The total GPU units count in the cluster.

clusterFreeMemoryMb.Description: The free memory in the cluster in MB.

clusterUsedMemoryMb.Description: The used memory in the cluster in MB.

clusterFailoverMemoryMb.Description: The failover memory in the cluster in MB.

clusterFragmentationMemoryMb.Description: The fragmentation memory in the cluster in MB.

clusterHypervReserveMemoryMb.Description: The memory reserved for Hyper-V in the cluster in MB.

clusterInfraVmMemoryMb.Description: The memory of the Infra VM in the cluster in MB.

clusterTotalMemoryMb.Description: The total memory in the cluster in MB.

clusterNonFailoverVmMb.Description: The non-failover memory in the cluster in MB.

clusterMemoryUsedByVmsMb.Description: The memory used by VMs in the cluster in MB.

effectiveAvailableMemoryMbOnHost.Description: The available memory on the host accounting for VM placement size and any host VM reservations.

availableGpuCount.Description: The available amount of GPUs on the host to use after accounting for GPUS used by reservations on the host.

vmUsedMemory.Description: The VM used memory per VmId.

gpuType.Description: The GPU type of the VM.

numaNodesData.Description: The numa nodes information for Hpn VMs.

startupMemoryMB.Description: The total amount of RAM in the virtual machine, as seen by the guest  operating system. For a virtual machine with dynamic memory enabled, this represents the initial memory available at startup.

currentMemoryUsageMB.Description: The current memory used by the virtual machine.

totalMemoryInMb.Description: The total memory on the NUMA node.

logicalCoreCountPerCore.Description: The logical cores per core count.

effectiveAvailableMemoryInMb.Description: The effective available memory on the NUMA node in MB.

freeVCpuIndexesForHpn.Description: The free VCPU indices for the Hpn VMs.

vCpuIndexesForHpn.Description: The VCPU indices for Hpn VMs

vCpuIndexesForRoot.Description: The VCPU indices for the root.

authCode.Description: DCAccess Code for the Self Managed shipment.
